title: Advanced Language Proficiency Course for Knowledge Enhancement and Automation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of grammar
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen advanced language proficiency required in elementary education and automate language usage processes. Implements fluid scheduling aligned with individual learner progress

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 90% accuracy in constructing grammatically correct sentences using language rules
Learners enhance automated appropriate vocabulary selection to over 85% proficiency across diverse linguistic contexts (e.g., narrative construction, expository writing)
Learners reduce language errors by 50% through feedback-driven self-correction processes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
